2.0.name: wordpress/kevinjohn-gallagher-pure-web-brilliants-capital-p-iss-off
2.0.description: Removes crazy, draconian, and released untested filters that break websites and cause issues for those whose language isn't American English. If you're wearing a "WordPress: Made in Texas" T-shirt, you'll not need this.
